attributes.title: Mount Olympus Bottled Water
attributes.description:
Created on November 13, 2010 by VictoriaEdwards on Sourcemap.org:

Based in Salt Lake City, Utah, Mount Olympus Waters Inc. bottles water from the Mount Olympus Spring.  It is bottled at a plant in Salt Lake City and then taken to smaller distribution offices across Utah and Idaho for delivery.

attributes.name: Mount Olympus Bottled Water
attributes.title: Mount Olympus Bottled Water
attributes.description: Based in Salt Lake City, Utah, Mount Olympus Waters Inc. bottles water from the Mount Olympus Spring.  It is bottled at a plant in Salt Lake City and then taken to smaller distribution offices across Utah and Idaho for delivery.

attributes.name: Spring Water
attributes.1: Neffs Canyon, Salt Lake City, UT 84124, USA
attributes.address: Neffs Canyon, Salt Lake City, UT 84124, USA
attributes.title: Spring Water
attributes.description: The Mount Olympus spring is located southeast of Salt Lake City at the 5,000 foot level of Neffs Canyon, a protected source surrounded by a federally designated wilderness area.  The spring is capped, and then piped to a collection site, where it is then transported to the bottling plant in a tank truck.

attributes.name: Biodegradable Bottle
attributes.title: Biodegradable Bottle
attributes.description: Wells Plastic specializes in producing biodegradable bottles using the additive Reverte, which when added to plastic causes it to biodegrade.  This bottle is used by Mount Olympus to make their 20 oz., and will soon be used in all of the sizes offered.

attributes.name: Vernal Distribution Office
attributes.title: Vernal Distribution Office
attributes.description: The water is delivered to the distribution office already bottled.  From here it's delivered by truck to offices, homes, and grocery stores.
